name: Cunning Rogue
description:
A 7drl 2018 Entry.

A rogue enters the Dungeon of Doom to claim the fabled treasure at the bottom of it, but this is no ordinary rogue, this is a cunning rogue. Able to predict monster attacks this rogue can dodge or even use foes against each other.

26 Floors

27 Monsters with different AI patterns.

Avoidance and low HP based combat with several different attack effects.

Lets go die in a dungeon!

Update - Post 7drl has menu upgrades as the base system was causing people to struggle. More menu upgrades and item descriptions planed due to feedback.
